argument.name: number_of_characters
argument.description: The number of characters to return. Numeric

page.description: Returns a portion of a string starting with the rightmost character.
page.discussion: RIGHT() returns a character string containing the specified number_of_characters starting from the C string 's right-most character.
page.example: right(LASTNAME, 4) -> " " (4 blanks), if LASTNAME is a 10-character field containing "Smith" right(trim(CITY), 7) -> "chester", if CITY contains "Winchester"
